moves.name: Fake Out
moves.description: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Tail Whip
moves.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Foresight
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Attract
moves.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

moves.name: Sing
moves.description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

moves.name: Double Slap
moves.description: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Copycat
moves.description: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

moves.name: Assist
moves.description: The user hurriedly and randomly uses a move among those known by other Pokémon in the party.

moves.name: Charm
moves.description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. The target's Attack is harshly lowered.

moves.name: Feint Attack
moves.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

moves.name: Wake-Up Slap
moves.description: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. It also wakes the target up, however.

moves.name: Covet
moves.description: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target's held item.

moves.name: Heal Bell
moves.description: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status problems of all the party Pokémon.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.

moves.name: Captivate
moves.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target is charmed into harshly lowering its Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Play Rough
moves.description: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.
